text: The 1993 South Pacific Mini Games were held at Port Vila in Vanuatu from 6–16 December 1993. It was the fourth edition of the South Pacific Mini Games. ==Participating countries== Fifteen Pacific nations participated in the Games: Note: A number in parentheses indicate the size of a country's team (where known). ==Sports== The six sports contested at the 1993 South Pacific Mini Games were: * * * * * * Note: A number in parentheses indicates how many medal events were contested in that sport (where known). ==Final medal table== Fiji topped the medal count: ==See also== *Athletics at the 1993 South Pacific Mini Games ==References== Category:Pacific Games Pacific Games Pacific Games Category:1993 in Vanuatuan sport Category:International sports competitions hosted by Vanuatu Category:December 1993 sports events in Oceania
title: 1993 South Pacific Mini Games
